response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your business operations. Given its exceptional quality and the unique features it offers, I estimate its true worth to be over $10,000. Considering your specific needs and the benefits this product could bring to you, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $9,500. This represents a fantastic opportunity to acquire a high-value asset at a competitive rate. Should you require any further information or have questions about the product, please don't hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 9500}
